address_1.description: The address to use in the request.

address_2.description: The address to use in the request.

first_name.description: The first name to use in the request.

last_name.description: The last name to use in the request.

city.description: The city to use in the request. You must provider either both the city and state, or the zipcode.

state.description: The state to use in the request, abbreviated. You must provider either both the city and state, or the zipcode.

zipcode.description: The zipcode to use in the request. You must provider either the zipcode, or both the city and state.
